Born to Kill Heavy Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Born to Kill Heavy Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Born to Kill Armour Set: 
 
 1. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 2. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Boots 
 3. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 4. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 5. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure lourde Born to Kill, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Born to Kill complet : 
 
 1. Born to Kill - Gilet de combat lourd 
 2. Born to Kill - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 3. Born to Kill - Gants de combat lourds 
 4. Born to Kill - Casque de combat lourd 
 5. Born to Kill - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Born to Kill; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Born to Kill-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Born to Kill - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 2. Born to Kill - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 3. Born to Kill - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 4. Born to Kill - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 5. Born to Kill - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Set completo di armatura pesante Born to Kill, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Born to Kill: 
 
 1. Born to Kill - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 2. Born to Kill - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 3. Born to Kill - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 4. Born to Kill - casco da combattimento pesante 
 5. Born to Kill - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

El set completo de armadura pesada Born to Kill, contiene las 5 partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Born to Kill - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 2. Born to Kill - Botas de combate pesadas 
 3. Born to Kill - Guantes de combate pesados 
 4. Born to Kill - Casco de combate pesado 
 5. Born to Kill - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 낙인 찍힌 살인자 강화 방어구 세트입니다. 낙인 찍힌 살인자 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 낙인 찍힌 살인자 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (남성)
 2. 낙인 찍힌 살인자 - 강화 전투부츠 (남성)
 3. 낙인 찍힌 살인자 - 강화 전투장갑 (남성)
 4. 낙인 찍힌 살인자 - 강화 전투헬멧 (남성)
 5. 낙인 찍힌 살인자 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (남성) [#Legal]

The complete Born to Kill Heavy Armor Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Born to Kill Armor Set:
 
 1. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Men)
 2. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Boots (Men)
 3. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Gloves (Men)
 4. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Helmet (Men)
 5. Born to Kill - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Men) [#Legal]

 4. 天生殺手 - 重型戰鬥頭盔(男用) 
 5. 天生殺手 - 重型戰鬥護脛(男用) [#Legal]
